comments.text:
+Tim Stout Nobody is born a homosexual, lesbian, or transgender. There is 
no science that has ever confirmed or discovered a so-called "gay" gene. 
It's called sin, the same kind of sin that destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah 
about 4,000 yrs ago through God's judgment.
comments.author: 11abk

comments.text:
+Tim Stout That's incorrect, actually. Transgender people are born totally 
normal mentally. It is a physical condition only. While a transgender body 
usually appears operates in a "typical" way, it is the WRONG body for that 
person. They are literally trapped in the wrong body and have to live a 
fake life until they come out and transition. Both intersexual and 
transgender bodies present a physical "difference" only, not mental in the 
slightest ("difference" being quoted bc society deems it as "not normal"). 
If transgenderism was a mental birth defect, then it would be suitable to 
attempt to change the mind instead of the body (which is what society / 
doctors used to do ignorantly before being educated). That's why 
transgender people change bodies, not brains/minds. Brain scans reveal a 
transgender person's brain to be the opposite gender of their assigned sex 
("trans" meaning the gender and the sex being "across from each other"). 
You are right in that gay / les / bi / pan / asexuality are brain-oriented 
or mental ways of being, all of which are congenital as well.
comments.author: T. Isaac

comments.text:
I have to say, though, that I don't count intersex people as being in the 
LGBT community. They are only born psysically different, while the LGBT 
people are born different mentally. They are born liking me/women/both or 
born feeling they should be the opposite sex.
comments.author: Tim Stout

PORTIA DE ROSSI.

WE'VE BEEN MARRIED
ALMOST TEN YEARS NOW, RIGHT?

PRETTY WELL.

- SO WE KNOW
WHAT EACH OTHER IS THINKING.
SO ON THE COUNT OF THREE,

WE'RE GONNA SAY
WHAT WE'RE THINKING, OKAY?
HOW DID YOU GET OVER THAT?

I THINK THAT'S--
YEAH, THAT'S ELLEN POMPEO.

IT WAS LIKE A--

MORE INTO BABY GOATS

ALTHOUGH, BABY PANDAS,
YOU CAN'T DENY--

- BUT THE BABY GOATS,
YOU CAN'T BEAT THAT.

AND NOW YOU'RE MARRIED
TO A COVER GIRL.

WHICH IS VERY PERSONAL.

IT'S A VERY,
VERY PERSONAL STORY.
- WHY DO YOU LEAVE YOUR SOCKS

BY THE EDGE OF THE BED
ALL THE TIME?

- YOU KNOW HOW YOU JUST
TAKE THINGS OFF AT NIGHT

AND THEN JUST LEAVE THEM
ON THE EDGE OF THE BED?

YOUR NIGHTGOWN OR SOCKS

AFTER I TOOK MY SOCKS OFF
BEFORE I GET INTO BED.

YOU DON'T HAVE TO TELL ME.
YOU DON'T HAVE TO--

IF IT'S GONNA BE CYRUS,

- THAT WAS A BLINK.
SO CYRUS--

THANK YOU SO MUCH
FOR BEING HERE.

FOR BEING HERE
